Name: Toy - Land Explorer
Description:
Summon a "land explorer" in front of you.
You can jump in and swim freely inside it.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description$english:
Summon a "land explorer" in front of you.
You can jump in and swim freely inside it.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description2$english:
Toy Usage Restrictions:
1. Each player can only summon a maximum of 3 of these toys at once.
2. This is an obstruction-type toy. You can toggle whether you're affected by other players' obstruction toys in the Settings menu.
3. This toy cannot be used inside dungeons.
4. Toy summoning is limited per area. Try switching to another if you've reached the max.
5. Toy count is also limited near each character. Please summon in a more open area if needed.
